properties.description: d2 po s70a narra st. acacia pinagbuhatan pasig city ay ngrerequest ng bceo o tanod plagi nlbg pong my ngiinuman d2 at ngkakantahan khit hating gabi n katulad po ngaun sana ay my mgbantay nmn po d2 salamat po.. sana po ay hindi nio mabanggit ang aking pangalan pra po s aking kpakanan

this is regarding their promo unlitxt...i was trying to subscribe with this promo but i wasnt able to subscribe rather they are trying to tell me to subscribe to another promo...that telco company is globe...yearly they do this during this time when they know that a lot of people are going to use txt or call...

Message: Nawala ang cp ko d2.e2 na ang bAgo koNg romaing#.D2 na kau magtTxt saken.musta na kau jan lahat?magpa2dala ako ng pera jan nxtweek.load mo muna 2 ng 300.txtbk

cellphone #: +639153283153

sana po mablock tong # na to. it keeps sending me with message as above.

I am receiving annoying spam texts from smart. The thing is they are using normal cellphone numbers to send spam.

Here are some links about the issue.

http://www.amorfrancis.com/spam-text-messages-from-smart.php

http://www.pinoytechblog.com/archives/smart-sends-deceptive-sms-spam

I hope something can be done about it. Very deceptive move by Smart.

I suggest initially this should be brought to public attention.

John

properties.category: Labis na billing, Walang signal o mahirap makakonek,
properties.description: Well. I can't send text messages and I often lose CP signal. Is that something that I'm paying for? I hate it. It sucks. And I really can't comprehend or i don't know some of the things listed in my billings. I don't know if this is something illegal or something that u just don't know. Whatever it is, it is freaking eating my money!

Stay subscribed to receive inspiring messages daily and a chance to be one of the winners of P500 Load. Register for FREE, txt GEMS REG <name/age/gender/address> ex. GEMS REG Sally Po/25/f/B7L2 San Lorenzo Bicutan. GEMS OFF to unsubscribe. Promo Extended until April 30, 2010 DTI-NCR Permit #2247 S09 C flyers 4 dtails

Sender: 2989
Received: 10:50:10am
Nov. 6, 2009

kapapa e-load ko pa lang ng P30 dito sa aming lugar nagpadala na agad ng 2 messages ang 235 smart. Nidelete ko na nga para kako e huwag mabawasan ang load ko, pero ng itext ko na ang anak ko e nag zero balance na siya. Ang bilis talaga, as in inubos lahat ng niload ko. At ilang beses na itong nangyayari sa akin. Ang nakakairita pa e sa hirap ng buhay nakukuha pa ng smart na nakawin o kunin ang binili mo na sa kanila.

properties.incident title: madalas ang parkawala ng load dahil s txt spam
properties.description: nagload ako sa guadalupe ng globe autoload worth 25, pra s gf ko.. tpos maya-maya nkatanggap ako mula sa kanya na kinain daw load nya kc ngpadala daw ang globe ng tone na hindi naman sya ng-subscribe s ganun..

Contrary to the NTC memorandum circular on extending the validity of prepaid credits, I found out that Smart is violating the provision that says:

 "For each new load that is purchased, the amount of the unused loads earlier purchased that are still within the validity period shall be added to and accumulate to the new load. The new minimum validity or expiry period shall be based on the sum of the new load plus the unused load..."

Just two days ago, I still had Php700.00-plus worth of load but when I checked today, it went down to just Php300.00-plus. When I called up Smart, they said that the credits I loaded last July 27 expired despite having reloaded on August 17.

properties.category: Walang signal o mahirap makakonek, Laging napuputol pagtumatawag, Mabagal na pagpadala at pagdating ng mga mensahe,
properties.description: Always choppy ang Sun and madalas putul lagi sa 15th minute ang unli call then i need to wait for another 30-45minutes bago makagawa ng another call

properties.incident title: Case of the Missing Free Text  of Two Load 35
properties.description: I added load 35 (w/ free 30 text) to my cp on Aug 19 to balance of my previous load 35 with still 30 unused free text.Then I enrolled my cp to UNLI20. But when I started texting to same network, the system is deducting the text from my free text and not from the unlimited service that I enrolled in. Actually it ate up all the 30 free text of my previous load plus the  new 30 free text of new load when I check the load balance on Aug 20 prior to expiry of my UNLI20. I reported the incident to Smart Website on afternoon of Aug 20 about the incident and they emailed me that there is no record of my latest load 35 with free text. I answered that said load 35 was made Aug 19 w/  reference # 360330249041. I am still waiting for their counter response.

Buong mag hapon walang load ang mother ko bandang 5 pm nag pasa ako ng load akalain nyo ba na after 5 to 10 mins bigla may pumasok na MMS from 2346 at sinasabi na you dont have enaugh load to received the MMS tapos wala na yun P10 na pinasa ko sa mother ko. tumawag ako sa 211 sa globe to complain ask ko paano nalalaman ng 2346 na may load na ang mga prepaid ibig bang sabihin nito globe allowed 2346 to monitor load ng mga subscriber nila.

then eto pa sa customer hotline nila na 211 may time limit pag lumagpas ka sa time automatic matatapos yun usapan nyo kahit di ka pa tapos sa complain mo at you have to call again

gabe globe ninakawan ka na ng load binastos ka pa pag nag complain ka sa kanila

Nakatanggap ako ng "hi hello" messages from 6800 last Aug 2, 2009. Ngayong araw Aug 12, 2009 meron nanaman akong natanggap. Laghiya ang liit na nga ng load ko nabawasan pa. P2.50 ang nababawas kada msg ng 6800 na yan. Di naman ako nagsubscribe sa lecheng 6800 na yan. Nagreply ako ng "HELLO OFF" sa pag-asang di na uli ako makatanggap at di ulit mabawasn ng P2.50. Actually nuon pa ako nakakatangap ng ganitong spam msgs. Sana naman maaksyunan to ng NTC. Kundi kayang protektahan ng gobyerno na to ang interes ng mga Pilipino at subscribers ay sa NPA (New Peoples Army) na lang tayo lumapit at ipatira yang mga opisyales ng mga spam companies na yan pati na yang mga taga-NTC!!!

nawala yung 30 pesos na load ko... 
kakaload ko lang ng 30 pesos kaninang 8 pm!
Network busy  in Smart - Davao City

my 35 pesos load has been stolen by Smart, yesterday 27 July 2009.

Ely
09215599964

properties.incident title: Globe automatically subscribe me to their promo
properties.description:
Last April-30-2009 I received a text on my cell # 09063764158 saying:

You have a new message. Retrieve it from http://www.myglobe.com.ph MMS Section. From: 2346 Password: bejnion Sbj: TOP TRUE DIVA Message expires after 24 hours.

Then, suddenly 15 pesos was deducted from my load. I called 211 but they said that I was subscribed to that content. I said my phone is not even capable of receiving MMS messages why would I subscribe to it. They responded they cannot do anything about it, they just give me instructions to unsubscribe and they won't return my load. I hope you can help me with this...
Thank You.

Date: July 24,2009

Smart Load All Text 20

1/2 24 jul 15:49:All Text 20(100 smart/tnt txts+10all network txts) has been loaded to 09293993333 frm 09182797390. Use by 25 jul. DTI-ncr no. 0918 s'08.

Akala ko ba mas mahaba na ang expiration ng Load bakit dito sa Load na all text 20 eh sabi expiration ng ni load ko July 25.

properties.incident title: Disappearing load after i recieved MMS message
properties.description:
I load for P30, and minutes later without having sent any single message, i received mp3 MMS message. I deleted the message right away without reading it because i dont want that MMS. Upon checking my load balance, it says 0 load. I tried calling their hotline *888, it says i got no enough load to make a call. What the fuck is this? This happened to me more than trice already. My number is 639216718021. This is full of shit!

I also got my old SIM block and was not able to use my number, that's why I bought a new SIM and I kept my old one. A month later, I tried calling that blocked SIM, somebody answered and told me he owned that number.

properties.incident title: lost  load  for  call not  connected
properties.description: I  dialled and  was  not  connected  but I  lost  the  100 prepaid  credit  that  I  just  load.  I  called  the  smart customer  service  but  they  told  me  they  cant  check if my  complaint is  valid  because  they  have  system  enhancement and  told  me  to  call  back  at  7 am  to  report again. Yolly  Quila   and  Alvin  Mangahas  can  not  make detailed  report but  I  need  to  personally  call back  and report  again.

aakala ko ba mas matagal na ang expiration ng Load ngayon effective Jul 19. Nag Load kasi ako ng ALL TEXT 20 ng smart noong July 20, may na recieved ako na text na nagsasabi na Meron Ako Load na 100 free text plus 10 free text sa ibang Network at sinabi rin na mag expire ang Load ng July 21. So the Following day nag try ako mag text at yon na nga wala na load ko. Kasama ba yong mga ALL Text 20 sa mas mahabang expiration?

properties.incident title: Nawalang Load ni hindi pa nga gumagamit nung load
properties.description: Nagload ako ng P100-worth call and text card ngayong ala 6:30 ng gabi, at matapos ang 30 minuto, may nagpadala ng MMS sakin galing ng 239 na hindi kailanman ko sinubscribe-an, at hayun.. viola! nawala ang load kong 100 peso. ni hindi pa nga ako nagsesend ng text man lang o tumawag. balak ko pa naman sanang itry kung totoo ba ang press release na ang extended na ang load expiry.. at napatunayan ko nga na wala pang 1 araw na lumilipas, wala pang isang oras, UBOS NA ANG LOAD. nakakainis sobra! sayang ng 100 pesos, sana nagdonate na lang ako sa simbahan ng 100, hindi nagdonate sa walang hiyang cellphone network.

missing load dtd July 14th,balance inquiry last july 10th-php217.00,july 14th php0.00.used only for texting purposes.did not join any promo or subscriptions.this incident already happened thrice-missing load,the 1st time was last Dec'08,the 2nd was last jan'09/1st wk of Feb'09.my cellphone number is 0917-9180258 my name is rommel sicat of valenzuela city.

Kasali ba dito yung mga text promos? For example sumali friend ko sa text WOW promo na katatapos lang last July 13, 2009. Started June 1, 2009 seven(7) pesos per download. Noong period ng promo, may website pa kung saan makikita mo raw mga daily and weekly winners, di naman updated. Ngayon ni-check ko, 404 Not Found error na, ni walang info sinong nanalo nung grand draw. Pwede nyo check sa www.egg.ph website for verification. Sana kasali ito kasi malaki rin nasayang na load ng friend ko kung basta ganito na lang.

Abusive na talaga ung mga telcos natin sa Pinas. Like sa ibang bansa kng prepaid ka kunyari nag load ka ng Php10 tos ung expiration nya is 15days. Pg nag expire un dapat d mawawala instead na idadagdag un sa next mong pg rrealod para d nman kmi lugi as consumer.

nakakainis ang globe 2x ako nakareceived ng ringtone just this morning after i've loaded 100 on my mobile phone. I asked Customer service if they can bring back that P30 since  i don't remember subscribing to downloading ringtone. Kesyo na-validate ng system na ok lang daw na nagsend sila ng ringtone kasi I did not respond to their message asking if I want to stop sending ringtone. Sabi ko in the first place hindi dapat nila ginawa magsend agad ng ringtone if nagtatanong lang sila kung gusto ko ng ganun klase services at hindi dapat nagbabawas sa load. Saka hindi dapat nila inassume na dahil di ako sumagot ng NO or YES eh they can continue sending ringtones, since I am a busy person sometimes I ignore some messages lalo na kung quote lang, unless makikita ko emergency yun messages na marereceived ko. I hope that this group would really push hard to bring justice for all the consumers na ginagawan nila ng ganitong kalokohan. Ginagawa nilang tanga ang mga tao, kesyo sinisisi nila sa consumer ang mga ganun klaseng services at hindi daw ang system ang me problema. Nagpapa-promo nga sila ng kung ano2 gimick pero ang totoo binabawi rin nila sa consumers yun sa pamamagitan ng mga ganitong klaseng hidden gimmick. Goodluck po sa inyo at sana magkaron ng magandang result ang lahat ng mga complaints natin mga consumers. Thank you!

I am a line subscriber to Smart, and I received in January 2009 an SMS on MP3's from 206. I requested Smart's call center to stop the spam messages. Still the spam messages sent by 206 was charged to me: 1000+ were charged to me in February, 400+ in March, and 200+ in April. Smart claims that these were valid transactions.

properties.incident title: reklamo ng mga retailers sa GLOBE LOAD
properties.description:
May mga promo ang globe na hindi katanggap-tanggap sa mga retailers nila at di umano ang promo nito ay parang isang paraan ng pagnanakaw at pang-aabuso sa mga retailer.

Inaalok ng Globe sa mga retailer nito na mag-load sa kanilang retailer's wallet (yung pambenta sa mga customer) ng mahigit sa P3500 na worth of load sa isang kalendaryong buwan para magkaroon sila ng 300 free text na pwede nila magamit... Ngunit ito ay magagamit mo lang kung mayroong load na kahit piso sa pang personal na load. maganda sana yung promo pero reklamo ng karamihang retailers, hindi naman xa magagamit kasi kailangan magload pa sa sarili nila. gumagamit pa sila ng Share-a-Load subalit pati din dito ay biglaan nawawalan ng personal load.

Kung ikukumpara sa mga retailer sims ng smart, mayroon din silang promo na 300 free text ngunit sila ay nagbibigay ng piso na tumatagal ng isang buwan at sa sun naman ay hindi na kailangan ng balance sa personal load para magamit yung promo nila.

Kahit sa mga retailer ng Globe ay pinagkakaperahan din nila kahit may promo pa sila 300 Free text. nawawalan ng silbi yung free text dahil magbabayad din sila sa personal load nila at kung minsan hindi din na-crecredit yung free text.

properties.incident title: sana kasama dito yung mga retailers na nagkakaroon din ng problems sa telcoms
properties.description:
hindi lang prepaid subs ang nagkakaroon ng problema sa mga telcoms, kundi pati rin mga retailers ng mga telcos, lalo na ang globe. may mga isyu din ng hindi natatangap ng subs yung naiload sa kanila pero sa retailers naman ay naisend na sa mga subscribers yung load kaya nagkakaroon na mis communication sa mga retailer ng load at ng bumili ng load.

nangyayari ito dahil sa palpak na system ng globe. may oras din na hindi agad natutugunan yung mga problema ng retailer sa 2629, hindi dahil sa mga customer reps na sumasagot sa kanila kundi ung mabagal na action ng mga Nakakataas sa kanila, tulad ng naranasan ko na ine-report ko yung sim card ko na hindi ako makatawag sa kanilang hotline (2629, ito yung special number para lang sa mga retailer) pero hangang ngayon hindi pa nila nagagawan ng solusyon. halos 10 araw na ako naghihintay, 4 na beses tumawag sa hotline nila gamit ang ibang retailer sim, nag-email na sa trade service pero walang action silang nagawa.

sana lang hindi lang tayo magfocus sa mga nawawalan ng load ng mismong subscribers lang kundi pati yung ibat ibang serbisyo ng mga telcoms dapat natin tignan. madami pa problema ang hindi pa natin nalalaman.

Hello,

NTC, DTI & the Senate should also check the TELCOs on their various promos/gimmicks that could easily hoodwink  the subscribers through very clever marketing schemes, sales words, and even outright cheating or scams.

I used to be a Globe OFW subscriber here in Saudi Arabia  with no. 0915-350-8171.  I would like to relate my frustrating experience with Globe Telecoms during my vacation in Manila within March-April 2009.

On March 27th, I received an SMS (text message)from Globe's #2846: "...May 20 FREE TEXTS ka! Mag-load lang ng at least P50 frm Mar 27 to Apr 02..." So I loaded P50 on same day, but no free texts came.

On March 30th, I reloaded another P50; again no free texts came. On April 2nd 9:55AM, I reloaded P100; again no free texts came.

After my repeated follow-ups with Globe's Customer Service, I finally got my free texts on April 2nd 10:31PM with this SMS from GlobeReward: "Dahil nag-load ka ng P30 mula Mar 27, eto na ang 10 FREE TEXTS mo!"  Ayun, ang cheating or scam ng Globe!

The promo was 20 free texts for at least P50 load from March 27th to April 2nd.  I have loaded a total of P200 during such period (not just P30), and I deserve to get at least 20 free texts (not just 10).

On April 3rd, Globe's #2846 has the nerve to send me another SMS: "...May 20 FREE TEXTS ka! Mag-load lang ng at least P50 frm Apr 03 to Apr 09..."  On April 4th, I loaded P100, but no free texts came.

During such time, I was nearing the end of my vacation, and free texts would have been very useful.  Within almost whole day of April 4th until my flight back to KSA on April 5th, Globe's Customer Service's phone was dead.  Also, Globe's #2884 repeatedly responded to my "GROAM ON" request: "Sorry, your request cannot be processed at this time..."

I felt that Globe may have black-listed my number due to my repeated follow-ups.  Now I'm back here abroad, and my Globe number is not connected.  I may have lost around P150 worth of load.

Small  amount  for one subscriber like me.  But if this is happening to millions of the TELCO's subscribers, then it is huge scam.
(NOTE:  I have preserved on my phone all the above SMS, just in case anybody wants proofs.) 

P.S.:  Why do we need to have expiry dates on pre-paid loads?  We already paid for the loads, it's up to us when we need to use them.
 
E. FABROS
POBox 10043, Jubail I.C.
31961   K. S. A.
#+966-50-394-2328
elmer.fabros@yahoo.com

Naglu-load ako ng 50 pesos para sumali sa mga text promo ng Eat Bulaga. Pero apat na beses na akong nanakawan ng 26 pesos ng Globe bago pa ako makasali sa promo ng E.B. dahil nagpapadala sila ng Spam ringtones sa akin.

Nagload ako ng 50 pesos noong July 6, at 4:40PM. Dumating ang spam ringtone ng "True Backtracks" mula sa 2366 noong 9:43PM ng parehong araw. Tsinek ko kaagad ang balance ko, at yun na nga, 24 pesos nalang ang natitira sa akin eksaktong 9:44PM. Kaya minsan natatakot na talaga akong magpaload ng 100 pesos o mahigit dahil bago ko pa magamit, ninanakawan na ng Globe.

Kadalasa'y hindi na pinapansin nating mga Pilipino ito dahil busy tayo palagi, pero malaki ang nananakaw sa atin ng ganitong mga pakulo. Kasalukyan akong nag-a-undergo ng dialysis kaya malaking problema sa akin ito, hindi pa man din ako kumikita talaga. 

Ilang beses na rin ako tumatawag sa Globe, at tinanong ko na sila nung minsan kung may nagkocomplain sa kanila. Sagot naman ng isang attendant nila, madalas at marami silang natatanggap na complaints, pero nang tanungin ko kung ano ginagawa nila para solusyonan ang mga complaints, ang sabi niya lang na "noted naman" na yung mga complaints.

Thanks for this site. Now I can extend my complain to greedy Globe Telecommunication Network. My problem in Globe while my SIM is in roaming status here in Thailand started last year around October after my short vacation there in the Philipines.

I noticed everytime I recieve misscalls an alert notification message follows then the balance status. And I was surprised that unattended calls while in roaming status is chargeable in Globe, the reason explained by Globe representative to my friend there in the Philippines whom I requested to transact my concern. What a gluttonous service I hailed!

Telecom service here in Thailand is far away from Philippine telecom service. Here once your credit validity load expires the use of texting or calling is only ended not actually the expiration of load because once you re-fill load from your phone previous load balance is added to the new load account. The load when the validity expires is not actually perished instead the use of services only. In addition, telecom here provides feature of lending credit load to Thai people likewise to foreigners with minimum of 3months stay. 30Baht credit load is lend to customer and will be collected the load payment once the customer refill a load before the validity of load expires. They have also feature of extending the validity of load in exchange of certain charge (10Baht)...validity of load life will be extended in 8months.

Many more comparison I noticed within the five year work here in Thailand.

Hope my concern will be added in your summarized concern and complaint to greedy people behind the business of telecom in the Phils especially Globe.

Thanks
Smart telcom daily spam of promos

May P47.50 pa akong prepaid load noong June 4, tapos gumamit ako ng P10.00 dun. Kinabukasan ng June 5, P0.00 na ang balanse ko. Tinawagan ko ang NTC at nakausap si Mr. Sonny Gwayco, parang lawyer ng telcos. 

Nangako ang NTC na magkakaroon sila ng feedback sa problema ko. Dapat talaga, ang NTC ay may regulatory powers.

regarding globe's share a load system, they charge 1 peso for every transaction made thru sms by sharing a load to other globe prepaid users. ang problem lang sa globe eh kahit di successful yung pag share a load, may charge pa din sila na 1 peso, i think di tama yung ganung sistema nila. just now I tried sending a load to my wife, then I recieve this message from 2916 ," Sorry, your request can't be accomodated at this time. Please try again later". then I checked my remaining balance, 1 peso was deducted from my load. I hope they can do something about this. thank you!

I'm a SMART pre-paid cellphone user. For a couple of years now, I have been noticing that my load runs out even if I barely use my phone, and even before the so-called expiration date arrives. The pre-paid credits runs out faster if I buy the lower-value cards (P100 and below). I hope there was a way to verify lost pre-paid credits against actual usage.

properties.incident title: Mga nagttxt na humihingi ng load
properties.description: reklamo ko lng po may mga nagttxt kc sa mga kapatid ko ng load at sinasabi na ako daw ang humihingi sa kanila ng load at bagong roaming number ko daw un,take note 500 pesos ang hinihingi ko daw at nagmamadali pang pinasesend sa kapatid ko.Hindi lang po ako ang nagrereklamu pati ang co-worker ko nakareceived rin daw ang mga kamaganak nilang nasa pinas.Nakakapagtaka lang po bakit alam nilang nasa abroad kami.At isa pa po bakit pagtumatawag kami sa pinas d pa nga nagriring eh kaltas na sa load namin dito o kaya nauubos na ang phone card namin dito.minsan naman nagrering lang pero wala sumasagot pero nababawas ang load  or phone card namin..tinatanong ko naman SA OPERATOR dito ang sagot ng operator eh SA PILIPINAS DAW ANG KUMAKALTAS AT HINDI SILA..

properties.category: Nawawalang load, Napapasong (expire) load, Laging napuputol pagtumatawag, Mabagal na pagpadala at pagdating ng mga mensahe, Spam Messages,
properties.description:
i've had this sim for almost 4 years and the problem started sometime last year. every morning, 15 pesos worth of load always gets deducted to my current load without any reason. I get a bunch of spam messages offering free mms from their website and free songs if i  subscribe to weekly new songs and mms stuff. its very inconvinient and annoying because i always fear that whenever i load my cell, the next day another 15 pesos vanishes without me knowing the reason. i keep unsubscribing to the promos texting "OFF" to 2346 or whichever number they say i text to stop the spam info but it doesn't stop. 

so thanks for setting up this website. it's a great help. hope that this scam will stop soon coz its just robbing people blind of their cellphone loads.
I;m subscribed to a fixed line globe broadband. pero laging nag-ne-network error. as in, sa isang araw siguro, di lang samping network error.
Gusto ko magreklamo sa SUNnetwork.. Pag nasa loob ka na ng bahay wala ng signal.  Kungmagkaka signal naman hirap namang makapag send ng message.  Lugi ako kasi postpaid subscriber ako.

May katagalan na din akong Sun Cellular user, at talaga namang masaya ako dahil sa affordable na cost ng load denominations nila. Lalo na't sila ang nagpasimula ng UNLIMITED CALL & TEXT. Pero, nito lang huling dalawang taon eh, nagbago na ang tingin ko sa network na ito.

Paano ba naman, biruin mo. . maglo-load ka ng 7days Unli Call and Text worth P100, pero magagamit mo lang ng tatlong araw?!? Naka-cut ang UNLIMITED nila!

Well, naisip ko abusado din naman kasi akong magte-text text.. Kaya naman napapalampas ko ang mga ganu'ng pangyayari. Eh, pero nakakainis din kung paulit ulit at talaga namang mararamdaman mong nadudugasan ka na. Kaya minsan eh, sinubukan kong magreklamo sa CSR hotline nila at ayun nga. . . sasabihin nila na OVER USED or ABUSED daw ang pagte-text ko kaya kina-cut ang UNLI ko. Mga maximum ng 1000 text per day lang daw dapat at kung lalampas pa d'yan eh, nagreresulta talaga sa pagka-cut ng UNLI.

Ah, okay.. . sabi ko. Okay na sana, kaya lang ibang usapan na siguro kapag ganito ang mangyayari:

May P50 regular load ka, then ini-register mo ng CTU 25 ang P25 nito. So, may P25 regular load pa ko di ba? Alam n'yo ba na sa loob lang ng kalahating minuto eh, nalagas ang P15 nito at sampu na lang ang natira dahil sa MONO TONE na ipinadala sa akin ng LINTEK kung makasipsip ng load na NETWORK na yan! Tsk tsk tsk, talagang uminit ang ulo ko sa pangyayaring yan! Dalawang beses ako nadale ng ganu'ng pagnanakaw nila ng load. Samantalang ni kahit kelan eh, wala naman akong nilahukang text promo nila! Bago lang ang sim kong iyon!! Kasi, umiiwas na ko na parati na lang naka-cut ang UNLI kaya nagpalit ako ng bagong sim na tig-P39 ang isa.

Pero may isa akong naobserbahan. Ang lahat ng sim ko na nagkakaroon ng pagnanakaw ng load eh, nangyayari lang sa mga sim card ko na ACTIVATED ang GPRS! Kaya para maiwasan ang mga nasabi ko nang pagnanakaw ng SUN CELL... WAG MONG I-ACTIVATE ANG GPRS MO!

At isa pa pala. Sana maimbestigahan ang tungkol sa mga SIM CARD na 'BROKEN' na nire-repack at naibebenta pa! Isang lugar d'yan sa Valenzuela ang nakita kong nagrerepack ng GLOBE, SUN, SMART, TM na sim card!

Mapapansin nyo na may free text ang mga sim na BROKEN-REPACK, pero hindi nagagamit ang load!

Responsibilidad ng mga network ang pagkakasawata sa mga yan. Dahil bakit may mga nakakalabas na BROKEN SIM at naibebenta pa sa mga 'AUTHORIZED DEALER' KUNO!

Yan lang!

properties.category: Nawawalang load, Napapasong (expire) load, Iba pang problema, Spam Messages,
properties.description: my mom's cellphone keeps on recieving spam messages from Globe, specifically their G-Live. whatever we do, we connot stop nor decline the G-Live subscription.

nagpaload po ako ng regular load sa Globe sa isang tindahan, at ang ibinigay sakin ay ang GETXT20(EVERYBODYTXT) pagkatapos dumating sakin ng messge n galing sa 8888 na natanggap ko ang load... hnd ko na ito agad nagamit kc nung mag txt ako sa same network (globe) hnd na ito makasend kahit unang txt ko pa lamang ito pagkatapos ko magload... nung nagcheck ako ng balance, "0" na ang nkalagay d2 o zero balance! >_< kya nagload nanaman uli ako kaagad ng 15 dahil sa bbyahe ako ng gabing iyon sa bus... at nung nag bal-check uli ako, 15 nlng ang nakalagay d2... 
pagkatapos ng 24hours ng load na ito, sabay na nawala ang load na ipinalagay ko kahit regular load pa ito

nagiging suki na ako sa pagiging caller sa GLOBE customer service.
.madalas kasing nangangain ng load, hindi mabilis ang kanilang service, kailangan pang kinukulit at finofollow-up everyday para lang maisauli ang kinaing load.
.meron silang promo, magload ng 40 pesos, may 20 free text, pero 2 days lang mgagamit.. pag lumagpas a ng 2 days, bigla na lang mbabawasan load mo.

properties.category: Nawawalang load, Walang signal o mahirap makakonek,
properties.description:
Good day, 
GLOBE - I am a Globe postpaid subscriber for almost 7 years. Last April 26, 2009 we experienced a bad signal at our residence. I report it immediately to globe customer service, gagawan daw ng report, in out po ang signal dito sa area kaya hirap namin gamitin ang cp sa loob ng house. Ginagawa na daw ng technical team nila pero till now ganon pa rin.

SMART - We a smartload retailer, we recieved a 1 peso personal load from SMARTLOAD valid daw for 25 days para daw maging continue at enjoy ang pag sell ng smartload pero hours pa lng wala na, hindi na magamit.

Thank
ilang oras pa lang nakakalpas wala na agad yung load ko..

properties.category: Napapasong (expire) load, Walang signal o mahirap makakonek,
properties.description: malabo ang tawag sa smart

I usually load a prepaid call card only to find out that my load disappears whenever I fail to check my balance from time to time.  I have reported the case to globe and they have committed to give me a feedback but until now case remains unresolved.

properties.category: Nawawalang load, Napapasong (expire) load, Iba pang problema,
properties.description: dati ang smart kapag nag loload ka lagi, naiipon lang ang free text..hanggang umabot ng 1000+ ang free text ko kasi di naman ako lagi nag ti text, puro tawag lang..tapos nagulat na lang ako naubos ang free text ko..naging 450 plus na lang.....nagtaka ako paanong mangyayari na mababawasan yun e hindi naman ako madalas mag text? isa pang problema ko..kapag madalas ang load ko, both sa smart at sa globe, marami ding unwanted and unsolicited na mga text messages na pumapasok..di ba bawal na ito? bakit diretso pa rin?
sometimes my load gets eaten..

Ang bilis mag expire ng load
di sapat yung oras o araw ng load
di ko naman nauubos kaya napapaso lang
malaki pa natitira sa load ko pero inabot na daw ng expiration kya nawala na. di p nman ako madalas magtxt kya minsan, di na ako naglo-load kesa maubos ng di ko nagagamit..

properties.category: Mabagal na pagpadala at pagdating ng mga mensahe,
properties.incident title: mabagal na pagpapadala at pagdating ng mga mensahe
properties.description: laging failed pag nagsesend ng message;almost a hour dumating ang message;madali maubos ang load..

i've been tired of complaining with Globe about this issue. yes, they would return the load but only when their consumer took note of how much vanished. but for busy professional people like me who doesn't have time to "argue" about the hard-earned money they are taking from me, how could they continue blaming consumers and doesn't even do anything to stop such deceipt on their customers. i've been losing load since early this year, i've complained several times with globe, all i get is very poor response.

i loaded a PHP500 card last week and last night it has already been zero balance. 

i mainly use my load for texting. but i am not even a heavy texter.  I called once but less than 5 minutes and has not downloaded any ringtone or operator logo  or any other services from GLOBE.

properties.category: Nawawalang load, Napapasong (expire) load, Labis na billing, Walang signal o mahirap makakonek, Laging napuputol pagtumatawag, Mabagal na pagpadala at pagdating ng mga mensahe, Iba pang problema,
properties.description:
for long exploiting consumers to amass huge and immoral revenues, the telcos should be penalized and their officers sent to prison together with colluding government functionaries who perpetrated oppressive practices on the filipino people

call charge should be by the second as standard like in other countries, not by the minute or by option disguised as promo

When I go to Laguna I use Globe Tatoo for Internet access. While i am grateful to have such an access in a small municipality (Magdalena) the quality of service is often inadequate. But what really annoys me is that while waiting to get connected to the Internet, I am paying while waiting for the connection. Sometimes i use up all my load just waiting - this means I am paying while not getting service at all!!!

Before going to Laguna I bought P500 Smart Buddy to ensure having load while in the province. To my amazement after a few days & having hardly used my mobile i doscovered that my load was down to P60. When I complained I was informed that I had used the load making voice calls. I was not convinced but accepted the explanation. Then i discovered that my P60 was suddenly reduced to P2.60 - something improper was obviously happening. I am now weary of buying a large load for fear of losing it.

Raul Pertierra
rpertier@mozcom.com

properties.incident title: Look into Expiry of Cellphone Cards
properties.description: Please also look into the expiry dates of cell phone cards. Smart and Globe pre-paid cards have expiry dates at the back. There should be no expiry dates because the cards are not perishables. These cell phone companies find all the ways to force the consumers to consume their cards and loads in the shortest time possible.

I haven't bought load in weeks, in protest to the unwanted ads, ringtones and screensavers that keep popping up on my phone despite my blocking them over and over again. I text via katext.com or someother online free texting center.

properties.category: Walang signal o mahirap makakonek, Mabagal na pagpadala at pagdating ng mga mensahe,
properties.description: I loaded 60 pesos around 1240. I was still able to text until around 4pm today (July 3). Thereafter even with 47 pesos load I was not able to text anymore.

I bought a 300-peso Smart Buddy load last June 18. A week later, I found out it's all gone. Called Customer Service and they told me my records showed that on June 21, I supposedly sent text messages one after another in the space of an hour thus depleting my balance. I said that could not possibly be as I hardly ever consume my balance in 60 days and I'm definite nobody had access to my cellphone except myself on that specific date.Long story short.I was made to go to the cellphone service center on the theory that my phone might have contracted a virus. The technician said that was not the case, my phone being an LG one. Back I went to the Smart wireless center where, after waiting for about an hour, a female employee made a report of my complaint and, having examined my records, more or less assured me I would have my missing balance reinstated. She said I should call Monday (June 29) to follow up.

Today (Tuesday), I called Customer Service -- only to be told that my "demand" was disapproved. I had earlier asked around and people told me this -- that is, having one's prepaid Smart load suddenly wiped out -- has happened not a few times to them or someone they knew. In fact, I read a recent PDI news item about VP Noli de Castro having experienced the exact same thing.
